GSD.description:
btrfs: fix race between quota enable and quota rescan ioctl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 26b7c0ac49a3eea15559c9d84863736a6d1164b4. For more details please see the references link.
